label: AB2_hR3_160_a_2a-001
title: Rhombohedral MoS$_{2}$ Structure
comments:
MoS$_{2}$ exists naturally in two forms: this rhombohedral structure, and the \href{current_web_home_dir/AB2_hP6_194_c_f-001}{the hexagonal structure, molybdenite, {\em Strukturbericht} $C7$}.  The two structures differ due to the stacking of the MoS$_{2}$ layers. 
 Depending on the preparation method, MoS$_{2}$ can exist in other forms, including a \href{current_web_home_dir/AB2_hP12_143_ad_bc2d-001}{trigonal structure}. 
 Hexagonal settings of this structure can be obtained with the option {\tt --hex}.
